backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with authorization, storage, Stripe mixins, and data models for users, listings, bookings, and related domain types.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function converting old listing records to a new format by adding a default propertyStatus field across stored maps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing frontend updates, affected files, components, and associated test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence summaries for various frontend files describing UI components, pages, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and dark‑mode color tokens for global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, SEO tags, favicon, and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, theming, and React Query, registering all application routes and rendering the root layout.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityCoun: Displays live availability counts for various property types with loading skeletons and animated cards.
frontend/src/components/BookingSteps.tsx: Renders a three-step booking guide with icons and animations based on property category.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedListings: Fetches featured listings and displays them using ListingCard components with loading skeletons and style variants.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Provides a styled footer with brand info, navigation links, social icons, and copyright.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements a responsive header with navigation, authentication controls, and admin/user options.
Displays an interactive India map with animated city markers indicating active and coming-soon locations.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps the app with Header, Footer, routed content, and conditionally shows a profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/ListingCard.tsx: Interactive listing card showing images, availability, category icon, and rating with multiple visual style variants.
frontend/src/components/ListingCard3D.ts: 3D‑styled listing card with hover animations, basic availability/status helpers, and image display.
frontend/src/components/MapSection.tsx: Animated map-like section displaying event markers, bouncing pins, and floating info badges.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form to collect and save user profile details with validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/PropertyStatusBa: Badge component mapping property status values to labels, icons, and color styles.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSection.ts: Review display and submission UI with rating input, comment form, and review list.
frontend/src/components/StarRating.tsx: Star rating component supporting filled/partial states and optional interactive selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context and login flow using AuthClient, exposing identity state and helper methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks that call various backend actor methods to fetch and mutate user profiles, listings, events, reviews, and admin data.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color variables, typography, animations, and base styling for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUsPage.tsx: Renders a styled About Us page describing the STYO platform, company registration details, and leadership information.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Implements the admin dashboard UI, loading admin-only data, managing owners, city charges, notifications, and quick-publish actions.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPolicyPage.tsx: Renders a styled booking policy page with scrollable sections explaining STYO’s terms and responsibilities.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryWorldPage.tsx: Displays a grid of accommodation categories and navigates to filtered listings when a category is selected.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with lazy‑loaded sections, animated category cards, and navigation to listings based on selected categories.
frontend/src/pages/ListingPage.tsx: Shows listings with category filtering, loading states, and lazy‑loaded 3D cards and map components.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page supporting viewing, editing, and saving profile data plus logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/PropertyManagementPag: Provides UI and logic for authenticated users to create, edit, and list their property listings using backend query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPropertySubmiss: Implements a public form for submitting new property listings with image uploads, validation, and backend submission.
frontend/src/pages/UnlockPage.tsx: Displays a property’s details and handles unlocking owner contact information, including rating display and contact actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, sizes, plugins, and extended utilities for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines current project state and requirements for adding a new PropertyStatus enum, updating backend Listing model, and updating frontend to display status badges. Includes existing features, pending requests, and architectural notes for implementing the new 4‑status model.
